original_title: Crayola Kids Adventures: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
overview: In this kid-friendly version of Jules Verne's Classic Tale, a Professor and his Companions are trapped aboard on a fantastic submarine with a mad sea captain. along the way they come face to face with exotic ocean creatures and strange, forbidden sights hidden from the world above.
title: Crayola Kids Adventures: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
